name: Customer360TabNavigation

events.name: onTabSelect
events.description: Fired when a tab is selected

functionalRequirements:
- Display tabs for Overview, Timeline, Contacts, Deals, and Insights
- Highlight active tab with color and underline
- Support click to switch tabs
- Show hover effects on tabs
technicalDesign: Renders horizontal tab navigation with active state styling. Uses flexbox layout with hover and active states.
